alert.note: Alert for Salisbury Sound to Cape Fairweather Coastal Area (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 03 at 10:59AM AKST until February 04 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and periods of freezing rain. Additional snow accumulations of 5 to 7 inches. * WHERE...Pelican and Elfin Cove. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Wet snow may be difficult to manage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Another round of heavy snow and mixed precipitation is expected across the Icy Strait Corridor from Thursday morning through Friday morning. Expect areas near sea level to transition to rain late Thursday through Friday morning. Confidence is low regarding the exact timing of the change over to rain. An earlier or later transition time may effect total snowfall amounts at sea level.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.

area.areaDesc: Salisbury Sound to Cape Fairweather Coastal Area
